"A complex animation is similar to CSS3 within any point of the transition from 0 (start) to 100 (end) you can have a property set to a value Kustom will then move smoothly to that.
So if you say that X should be at 100 at position 50 Kustom will move by 100 in the first half of the animation then stop.
Add your first property pressing plus on top."
Select a position (0 to 100 in percentage) this is when you want the property within the Animation to be at the selected value.
Choose which property you want to set at given position and to which value it should be ease can control transition from previous state.

XPosed module MinMinGuard has been detected a few users reported massive slowdowns in Kustom interface when using this module please uninstall it or whitelist Kustom apps if you have problems

"To do so please open the battery settings then press the arrow on top right near 'not optimized' tap 'all apps' look for Kustom and select 'never optimize'"
In order to disable Kustom notification the app needs to be removed from Android battery optimization list.

Kustom is currently not set as your live wallpaper do you want to set it now?

Your background is currently set to a non scrolling Image on some launchers (like Nova) this will prevent Kustom to scroll if you have this issue please go back to your launcher set a scrolling Image first (so not cropping it) and then set Kustom as wallpaper again.

"Welcome to Kustom! The super awesome Android design creator.
Please check out the Load Preset section and load something from the Basepack to understand what is possible.

If you need help check the FAQ or the Knowledge Base site in the Feedback section with Documentation Tutorials and much more."

Must return the font icon name
Write a list of colors in #RRGGBB format separated by comma

"Writes the text of an entry the constant 'index' will be replaced with item position (try just writing $index$ for an example)"
Enter either 0 1 2 3 for cancellable notifications (0 is the first) or s0 s1 s2 for persistent ones

"Scroll is in pixels fade/scale are 0 to 1 rotation is in degrees. You can use following parameters: x = scroll (0 first screen to 1 last screen) w = screen width h = screen height vx/vy/vz = gyroscope rotation (0 to 360) if available p = current trigger level (0 to 100) if available"
This formula will be used as a switch. When its output is 1 or f animation will move forward when its 0 or b animation will move back to start when is set to r animation will reset to start
You can use file:///localpath or http://url
Must return a valid color (either #RRGGBB or #AARRGGBB)
Must return a valid TimeZone ID (eg America/New_York) or an offset in minutes
Adds simple text markup like color bold italic and so on

Index of upcoming events if no date is provided index of day events if date is added. When prefixed with an a will show only all day events with e only normal ones. Index is zero based 0 is the first event 1 the second and so on a0 is the first all day event e0 the first non all day one.

"Date to be used. The Date can be returned by some other function or you can use text. For text dates you can both set it statically using the format '1955y11M12d22h04m00s' to express year 1955 month 11 day 12 at 22:04:00 (all fields are optional) or use 'a/r' (add/remove) operators so for example 'a12m3s' will add 12 minutes and 3 secs to current date."
A day use for example r1d for yesterday r1w for one week ago 1w for first day of this week and so on
Format to be used for the date see examples

Kustom is currently installed on your SD card. To work properly it must be moved to Internal Storage
Remember! If you are stuck you can always unlock by long pressing on the left bottom corner until the unlock button appears then click on it
You are done please check the Load Preset menu option to start with some preset and also look into the Featured tab to find more free awesomeness!
Watch an introduction video on how KWGT works and how to add it for the first time
Before we start I want to let you know that we are here to help if needed. Inside the app use the left menu for help tutorials communities or for contacting us we always reply!
Swipe right to left to begin
Welcome to Kustom! Your super awesome design creator
A complete set of presets to show the endless kapabilities of the Kustom engine
Presets exported manually or downloaded from the internet
This library allows you to include vector icons everywhere in your project. No limits are given. Scale with no limit use any Color at any time provide a contour and many additional customizations
"Material Design Icons' growing icon collection allows designers and developers targeting various platforms to download icons in the format color and size they need for any project."
FastAdapter the bullet proof fast and easy to use adapter library which minimizes developing time to a fraction...
MaterialDrawer the flexible easy to use all in one drawer library for your Android project.
Materialize comes with useful helper classes the complete material color palette and many additional utils. Use its theme as base. Let it manage your StatusBar NavigationBar Fullscreen behavior…

Animations allow the module to react to events like scrolling. To add a new animation press the plus (+) button located on top right of the screen if you add more than one then animations will be combined order is not important.
This container is empty you can add a new object to it using the plus (+) button on the top right of the screen.

Globals are dynamic preferences that can be used to change settings on more than one item at once. To add a new one just press the plus (+) button located on top right of the screen you can then switch a module preference to a Global by selecting the preference and pressing the globe icon (not all preferences supports globals).
There are no app shortcuts in this preset when you create a touch action to launch an app you can then change it quickly from here
There are no touch actions on this module you can create one using the plus (+) button on the top right of the screen.
You do not have any backup yet. Backups are created automatically by Kustom when you save a preset so you can restore if you accidentally delete it.

You do not have any exported preset yet. Just go back and select Export Preset from the main menu to export your first creation or use the Import button above to add something from your device storage.

A simple object holding a static picture
Single line text with many different transformations like curving and flipping
Scalable vector based icons from different packs
Add a prebuilt reusable component (signal indicators battery iconsâ€¦) or create your own
A simple object holding a animated picture (eg GIFs)
A container for other objects that supports transformations and allows item grouping and supports gravity.
Create progress bars with different styles shapes and colors
Customizable series for dates time battery and more with multiple style configurations
Create a rectangle a circle etc and fill them with colors gradients and more
A container for other objects that allows items to be stacked horizontally and vertically.
This item allows you to enter any text you can either choose from a list of examples or create your own string using a lot of available functions
This module is either unsupported or have been removed from this release.
Tap to switch to selecting a day
Tap to switch to selecting a year
Shows customizable persistent notifications to keep service alive
To customize this notification click on it to remove it check the app settings or long press this select the info icon then notifications and disable them
"Select 'all apps' on top first then scroll and find Kustom finally disable Battery Optimization"
High Accuracy (min 1 second max 10 seconds high battery usage)
Force: always show a customizable notification
Automatic: use a customizable notification when battery optimized to keep application alive
Disabled: do not use a customizable notification
Auto Rotate (use this if launcher rotates)
Default (update on location changes minute tick or every 5 seconds if music is playing slower in power save mode)
Fast (will always update on seconds tick) WARNING this mode uses a LOT of Battery! Please do not use this on a daily basis
Conservative (still updates on minute tick but will ignore music progress and slow down other changes)
Smart (will update on a per second basis when charging normally when not and slowly on low battery or in power save mode)
read Calendar events to display events in Google Calendar
call numbers directly since some shortcuts are configured to do so
write on External Storage in order to store presets fonts and bitmaps on the SD card
enable fingerprint sensor you can change this in the settings

To update on screen information the app requires access to position in the background. Kustom collects location data to update weather display WiFi info and calculate sunrise and sunset even when the app is closed or not in use.
get position to fetch weather calculate sunrise/sunset and get network info
get current signal strength and connectivity status
access Music Players audio to visualize Music
access Contacts Accounts Phone Logs SMS and Email to get missed calls texts and mails correctly
access data to understand which application is on foreground to give a better experience

Before we start please remember that at any time even in case of extra-terrestrial attacks Kustom team and our awesome community are here to help!
"We'll need your help accessing device features. You'll be ready to rock in no time!"
"We're glad to have you on board. Ready to transform your screen?"
Specify the Tasker String (e.g. Battery Level is %BATT) and then the Kustom variable name (e.g. battery). This will map the value to the Kustom formula $(tasker battery)$
Kustom has not been detected on your device please install a Kustom App to use this Plugin
This Plugin requires at least Kustom 3.26 to work please upgrade your main Kustom App
This plugin is not needed on Android 6.0 or newer you can safely uninstall it
This plugin requires a few permissions to run please accept them (you can also safely deny some simply that component wont work)
Plugin successfully installed icon will now be hidden from launcher at next restart
Plugin successfully installed please select the provider in main Kustom app settings
You can hide the icon from launcher if you want pressing the button below
